channel.title: Why can't people play my server?
channel.description:
Ok, so I have my server running and i have my hamachi client up, and my friend is connected to my hamachi network, and he is connected to the correct ip and port but yet he can't play my server... He said it says "Error connecting to server". What do i do? any help?
Thanks, Ranger65pure

item.title: Why can't people play my server?
item.dc:creator: @Ikoedlalampara Ikoedlalampara
item.description:
@Ikoedlalampara wrote:

You need them to have your hamachi ID, connected inside your hamachi, you need hamachi open, so do they, and your server has to go on BEFORE you open hamachi

Read full topic

item.title: Why can't people play my server?
item.dc:creator: @hawkgames hawkgames
item.description:
@hawkgames wrote:

If you don’t have no-ip you cant portforward
if you cant portforward then dont make no-ip
if you cant use any of these use sucky hamachi even though not many peeps join

Read full topic

item.title: Why can't people play my server?
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

cause hamachi sucks… try portforwarding and getting a no-ip. then it will work. also check ur anti virus if thats on he wont connect turn off
